attributes.action: Provide online live stream of classes from school classroom, option for parent
attributes.additional_details: At the moment we are risking life in name of mental well being, Current approach of keeping school open has more severe impact on family, if any of the family member dies. Please please don't leave people to die.
attributes.background: Current rules and lockdown declaration have no meaning when schools are open in full capacity. Schools should start direct streaming of class room and children should have option to either attend online or attend in person. Or presence should be on rotation basis. We can't leave people to die.
